com.google.ical.util
Class TimeUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.google.ical.util.TimeUtils

public class TimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility methods for working with times and dates.

Author:
Neal Gafter

fixedFromGregorian

public static int fixedFromGregorian(int year,
                                     int month,
                                     int day)
the number of days since the epoch, which is the imaginary beginning of year zero in a hypothetical backward extension of the Gregorian calendar through time. See "Calendrical Calculations" by Reingold and Dershowitz.

timeFromSecsSinceEpoch

public static DateTimeValue timeFromSecsSinceEpoch(long secsSinceEpoch)
Compute the gregorian time from the number of seconds since the Proleptic Gregorian Epoch. See "Calendrical Calculations", Reingold and Dershowitz.

Compute the number of seconds from the Proleptic Gregorian epoch to the given time.

timeZoneForName

public static java.util.TimeZone timeZoneForName(java.lang.String tzString)
returns the timezone with the given name or null if no such timezone. calendar/common/ICalUtil uses this function
